name: Pandorangehoods
0:
”Alexa, switch on hood”
”Alexa, set hood fan speed to 3”
”Alexa,set light to warm white”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Control your Pando kitchen range hood through Alexa.
Available functionality includes switching on and off, setting the fan speed and picking the light color temperature.
Before enabling this skill, the Pando range hood must be installed and associated to a Pando account using the "Pando range hoods" app, available for Android and iOS:
- Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.pandocappe.app
- iOS: https://apps.apple.com/it/app/pando-cappe-da-cucina/id6445810691
To complete the activation of the skill, just link your Pando account using the same credentials as used for the Android/iOS app.
